name: Zerealia
startIntroPart1: Hail, GOD chosen Prophet, head of the Alkins dynasty. You are the leader of a nation called Zerealia, whose people has had an history of war and resistance. Your reign was eulogized as the Prospered Reign of Hong Duc, as it was recognized for the extensive administrative, military, education and fiscal reforms you instituted, the conquest of the Champa states in the south, and a cultural revolution that replaced the old aristocracy with a generation of literati scholars. Even after the disappearance of the Dai Viet dynasty, your nation resisted hardships that would have destroyed the strongest empire, and is today one of the most prosperous countries in all of East Asia.
startIntroPart2: Wise and revered leader of Zerealia, your nation in now in need of your help to achieve greater glory. Will you guide Zerealia once again and bring your people to greater prosperity, until Zerealia becomes the center of the world? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
defeated: That's not an end. It's merely a beginning of your problems!
introduction: Hello~I'm of the Great Prophet of Akinia. Have nice day
afterPeace: I am glad the war is finally over.
